channel.title: 2 things
channel.description:
Can someone tell me how to fix this... when ever a new player logs on it starts them at my old home and not my new one how to i fix this???
Also how do i add an item and give it an effect like add a crate and when you click on it make you do an emote like the jig emote or the push up emote from the camo random event??? I know how to add a global object but i dont know how to give it an effect :confused: :|

[/quote]
You also need to go to client.java[/quote]
